ValidationRule.description: Forbid to create clients to users except dream or sys admins
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && !BEGINS( $User.Username, 'dream@icon.vuitton.com') && NOT( IsProspect__pc ) && NOT( SPO_BypassVR__pc )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have rights to create clients
